text: , colloquially known as , is a non-denominational Christian private and coeducational university in Kyoto, Japan. It offers Bachelor’s, Master’s, and Doctoral degrees to around 27,000 students. The university has a central campus in Kyoto, and also has satellite campuses in Kyoto, Kyōtanabe, and Kizugawa. == History == Doshisha University started in 1875. ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Colleges and universities in Japan
title: Doshisha University
